data.description_html:
The head of the weapon you touch is suddenly encased in a filmy halo that only you can see, extending out from the weapon to a distance of several inches.
Mighty wallop increases the damage of a bludgeoning melee weapon by one size category without increasing the dimensions or weight of the weapon.
For a Small weapon, find the weapon's damage value on the table below and adjust it to the value in the right-hand column for the duration of the spell.
For a Medium or larger weapon, refer to Table 2-2: Increasing Damage by Weapon Size (DMG 28).
Focus: A melee weapon.
data.name: Mighty Wallop
